briefTitle: A Survey of Breast Cancer Patients With Metastatic Bone Disease Receiving Oral Ibandronate
officialTitle: A Multi-Center Observational Survey of Breast Cancer Patients With Metastatic Bone Disease Receiving Oral Ibandronate (BONDORAL)
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Change in bone pain according to Visual Analog Scale (VAS) score
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Adults at least 18 years of age
* Histologically confirmed breast cancer with bone metastasis
* Receiving or indicated for the tablet formulation of ibandronate according to the summary of product characteristics (SmPC) and local labeling

Exclusion Criteria:

* Contraindication to ibandronate according to SmPC
* Ongoing participation in any trial evaluating the efficacy and/or safety of ibandronate
